startPage.title: Welcome to Event Planner!
startPage.subtitle: Manage your tommorrow.
startPage.creationDescription: Create new events in all details including, title, description, date, time, location, category, picture and priority of an event.
startPage.editingDescription: Easily edit already created events by changing data in corresponding edit form.
startPage.sortingDescription: You can sort events by name, date or priority.
startPage.searchingDescription: Use powerful search functionality by entering keywords, making it easy to locate a relevant event.
startPage.filtrationDescription: Events can be filtered based on categories, including art, music, business, conference, workshop, party and sport.
startPage.deletionDescription: Delete events one by one or you can delete all of them by navigating to your profile page.
